data: {"generalSituation":"Under the influence of the intense northeast monsoon, it will be windy over the coast of Guangdong tomorrow. A broad band of clouds will cover southern China in the next couple of days. It will be rather cool in the morning over the coastal areas and cold over inland areas. As the broad band of clouds thinning out and the northeast monsoon moderating, the weather will improve with temperatures rising gradually over southern China in the latter part of this week. However, it will still be cool in the morning. Under the influence of the dry monsoon, it will be generally fine over southern China early next week. The temperature difference between day and night will be rather large.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251119","week":"Wednesday","forecastWind":"North force 5, force 6 offshore, up to force 7 on high ground. Force 4 later.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy and cool. One or two light rain patches at first.
